attributes.action: Stop touts selling carling festival tickets!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After waiting online an hour before leeds festival tickets went on sale, when i finally got through to purchase a ticket 17 minutes after they went on sale 'weekend tickets' were sold out, much to my horror looking on ebay there was already 150 tickets going for double the list price. This year i have had enough! ive been every year since 1999 and its getting worse now, festivals should be about people who love music getting together and enjoying themselves, mean fiddler were trying to do something about this but couldent, please help stop the touts ruining music festivals for you all!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
